hero.title: Twenty One Pilots
hero.subtitle: Fan Experience
hero.description: Dive into the musical universe of Twenty One Pilots. Explore their complete discography, discover exclusive videos, find upcoming concerts and connect with a passionate community.

discography.title: Complete Discography
discography.description: Access all Twenty One Pilots albums, songs and lyrics. From their beginnings to their latest releases.

videos.title: Official Videos
videos.description: Watch music videos, live concerts, behind the scenes and exclusive content directly from YouTube.

concerts.title: Concerts & Events
concerts.description: Find upcoming concert dates, interactive venue maps and reviews of previous shows.

community.title: Fan Community
community.description: Join the forum, share your favorite playlists, connect with other fans and participate in passionate discussions.

playlists.title: Personalized Playlists
playlists.description: Create and share thematic playlists, discover new songs and save your favorite tracks.

store.title: Official Store
store.description: Buy official merchandise, records, t-shirts and exclusive Twenty One Pilots items.

discography.description: Explore all the albums and songs of the band

forum.title: Fan Forum
